title: Summer League Observations With Ben Golliver | Weekends with Wos
description:
Wos is joined by the Washington Post’s Ben Golliver to discuss what they’ve seen from Paolo Banchero, Chet Holmgren, and Jabari Smith Jr. They then discuss some off-court drama and speculation they’ve seen at the NBA Summer League.

Host: Wosny Lambre
Guest: Ben Golliver
Associate Producer: Isaiah Blakely
